This forum is designed to provide a heavily moderated area in which to conduct a quasi-formal debate. All topics are welcome.
 
 To use, simply provide a resolution in your opening post and indicate which side you wish to debate. Your opening post should then follow, laying out your argument to the best of your abilities. Any user is welcome to add to the affirmative or to the negative of the resolution. 
 
 Off-topic posts and ad hominems will be deleted. Opening threads will also be deleted if no resolution is presented. If you wish to explore a worthy resolution, flesh it out in the various other open forums before posting here. Repeat, this is a heavily moderated forum and, in using, you must abide by the stated rules of staying on topic and doing so respectably.
 
 If you notice a post which seemingly violates the above rules, please use the report post function. Do not respond to the post; it will only require further deletions.
 
 The debates in this forum will not have official judges. Polls will be set up for any member to leave his or her opinion on whether the resolution was upheld. Time limits will generally be assigned to the debate thread, typically one month before the thread locks. However if more time is needed there should be no problem with extensions. One would simply need to ask.
 
 Good luck in this forum! Give it your best shot.
